chrome_driver_exe_update package

Submodules

chrome_driver_exe_update.chrome_driver module

Module that ill create the webdriver.

It downloads files too.

class chrome_driver_exe_update.chrome_driver.ChromeDriver(downloads_path, headless, driver_executable, software_dir, downloads_type=None)[source]

Bases: object

Create the Webdriver.

In case that the webdriver is outdated checks the version of chrome and then downloads the chromedriver corresponding to the new version.

Parameters:

  • downloads_path (str) – Path to donwloads files.

  • headless (bool) – Run with window or not.

  • downloads_type (str, optional) – Type of file to be downloaded. Defaults to None.

downloads_path

Path to donwloads files.

Type:

str

headless

Run with window or not.

Type:

bool

downloads_type

Type of file to be downloaded. Defaults to None.

Type:

str, optional

driver_executable_path

Path to chromedriver. Defaults to None.

Type:

str, optional

create_driver()[source]

Creates driver with all the options and start.

If error, outdated start process to download new chromedriver.

Returns:

Driver to handle browser.

Return type:

Webdriver

Raises:

SessionNotCreatedException – When driver is outdated.

static download_file_from_url(driver, url, name_file, download_path)[source]

Downloads to downloads_path the url file and gives a name.

Parameters:

  • driver (any) – Driver that controls the browser.

  • url (str) – Url to download file.

  • name_file (str) – The name to rename file downloaded.

  • download_path (str) – Path to download file.

Returns:

New file absolute path.

Return type:

str

Raises:

TimeoutException – File doesn’t download in time.

chrome_driver_exe_update.cli module

chrome_driver_exe_update.cli.main()[source]

Module contents

Module that creates the Webdriver.

In case of chrome update it will automatically download the new compatible webdriver version.
